name: FigTag
description:
Create your tags as a variant component and apply them as tags to your frames.


Features:

Apply tags to one or multiple frames

Filter tagged frames

No need to run the plugin for change tag; change the first property of the tag instance, and the plugin will detect the changes (FigTag uses it as the status)

Auto delete tag on frame remove

Live tag position based on frame position

Tags will move with frames if the plugin is open.
